name: Apogodolypse
description:
A very relaxed entry (talking about the work it took), the game is basically about surviving a meteor apocalypse, dodge everything with the arrow keys or WASD and jump with SPACE. 

Assets made by Kenney (https://kenney-assets.itch.io/)

Character and animations from Mixamo

I'm happy with the result since I learned how to use Godot which was the idea, I think it's a great alternative to using Unity especially in 2D, but I wanted to try and make something in 3D to get better the workflow of importing Assets and complicate my life a little bit in general :)

Thanks for playing! :D
